channel.title: Parser on Nicholas Ng
channel.description: Recent content in Parser on Nicholas Ng

item.title: BibTeX parser and pretty printer in Go
item.description: nickng/bibtex is a BibTeX parser and pretty printer for Go. The main aim is the recreate a bibtex tool for the undocumented BibTeX format in a modern language that can be backwards compatible with the existing bibtex tool in the TeXLive latex distribution. See prettybib.nickng.io for a web-based interface.
